channel.title: Ismael Garcia's blog on Ismael Garcia's blog

item.title: Deploying Java Aplications With Kubernetes
item.description: Three months ago I was learning Docker swarm now I’m learning kubernetes as orchestrator this year I’m gonna write about k8s a lot so the idea here is show how to deploy Java Aplications within Docker Containers orchestra them with Kubernetes. When you run containers you always gonna need a orchestrator in order to be more efficient, faster and continuous delivery and so on that’s the reason why I’ve chosen kubernetes and the true is basically because is the most popular I would say it’s so robust, ambicious, fault-tolerance, scaling, discovery abilities and why not use it, mainly was created at Google and now is hosted by the Cloud Native Computing Foundation(CNCF).

item.title: Missandei is here
item.description: Jan 5, 2018 by Ismael Garcia I am really excited because my lady is here, yeah my laptop baptized as “Missandei” I was looking forward to get my precious, well let me tell you her features and what OS I have installed: Memory 12 GiB Processor Intel Core i7-350M CPU @2.90GHz x 4 OS Type 64-bit CentOS 7 Graphics Intel lvybridge Mobile i GNOME
